game.name: If Found...
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: If Found...는 고향을 찾아가고, 커밍아웃하고, 모든 것을 지우는 것에 대한 비디오게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: If Found... is a game about going home, coming out and erasing everything.

reviewHighlights.text: I appreciate that games like this exist. Queer media for queer people is great. This is game is kind of a slog to get through tbh. Firstly this should...
